tasks.title: Phase 0 Template Complete
tasks.description: The master template with Go-Fiber backend, Expo frontend, and LLM orchestrator is ready.

tasks.title: Backend: GPS Coordinate Model and CRUD Endpoints
tasks.description: Create a Coordinate model in backend/internal/models/coordinate.go with fields: ID (uuid primary key), UserID (uuid foreign key to User), Latitude (float64, not null), Longitude (float64, not null), Label (string, max 255 chars), Description (string, optional, max 500 chars), CreatedAt, UpdatedAt. Create DTO request/response types in backend/internal/dto/coordinate_dto.go. Create CoordinateService in backend/internal/services/coordinate_service.go with methods: CreateCoordinate(userID, lat, lng, label, description), ListCoordinates(userID, page, limit), GetCoordinate(id), DeleteCoordinate(id, userID). Create CoordinateHandler in backend/internal/handlers/coordinate_handler.go with REST handlers. Register routes in backend/internal/routes/routes.go: POST /api/coordinates (protected), GET /api/coordinates (protected), GET /api/coordinates/:id (protected), DELETE /api/coordinates/:id (protected). Add Coordinate model to database.go AutoMigrate. Register service and handler in main.go.

tasks.title: Backend: Satellite Data Module with Change Detection Placeholder
tasks.description: Create a SatelliteData model in backend/internal/models/satellite_data.go with fields: ID (uuid primary key), CoordinateID (uuid foreign key to Coordinate), ChangeType (string: construction, vegetation_loss, water_change, urban_expansion), Confidence (float64 0-1), DetectedAt (time.Time), ImageURL (string, placeholder), Summary (string, max 1000 chars), CreatedAt, UpdatedAt. Create DTO types in backend/internal/dto/satellite_dto.go. Create SatelliteService in backend/internal/services/satellite_service.go with methods: GenerateDummyAnalysis(coordinateID) that creates fake satellite change detection data with random change types and confidence scores, GetAnalysisForCoordinate(coordinateID, page, limit), GetLatestAlerts(userID, limit) that joins with Coordinate table to get user's alerts. Create SatelliteHandler in backend/internal/handlers/satellite_handler.go. Register routes: POST /api/coordinates/:id/analyze (protected, triggers dummy analysis), GET /api/coordinates/:id/satellite (protected, get analysis results), GET /api/alerts (protected, get user's latest alerts). Add SatelliteData to AutoMigrate. Register in main.go.

tasks.title: Mobile: Map Interface with Location Pinning
tasks.description: Install react-native-maps using: npx expo install react-native-maps (in the mobile/ directory). Create a new tab screen at mobile/app/(protected)/map.tsx that displays a full-screen MapView from react-native-maps. The map should: 1) Show user's current location (use expo-location, install with npx expo install expo-location), 2) Allow long-press to drop a pin, 3) Show a bottom sheet modal when pin is dropped asking for label and description, 4) POST to /api/coordinates to save the pin, 5) Load existing pins from GET /api/coordinates on mount and show them as markers, 6) Tapping a marker shows its label and a delete button. Create types in mobile/types/coordinate.ts for Coordinate interface. Update mobile/app/(protected)/_layout.tsx to add the map tab with Ionicons 'map-outline' icon between Home and Settings. Use hapticMedium() on pin drop and hapticSuccess() on save.

tasks.title: Mobile: Satellite Alerts Screen with Change Detection UI
tasks.description: Create a new tab screen at mobile/app/(protected)/alerts.tsx that displays satellite change detection alerts. The screen should: 1) Fetch alerts from GET /api/alerts on mount, 2) Display alerts in a FlatList with each item showing: change type icon (construction=hammer, vegetation_loss=leaf, water_change=water, urban_expansion=business), confidence percentage with color coding (red >80%, orange >50%, green <50%), coordinate label, detected date, summary text. 3) Add a 'Analyze' button per coordinate that calls POST /api/coordinates/:id/analyze and shows hapticSuccess() with a refresh. 4) Pull-to-refresh support. Create types in mobile/types/satellite.ts. Update mobile/app/(protected)/_layout.tsx to add the alerts tab with Ionicons 'notifications-outline' icon. Use NativeWind styling throughout.

tasks.title: Mobile: RevenueCat Subscription Integration
tasks.description: Install react-native-purchases: npx expo install react-native-purchases (in mobile/ directory). Create mobile/lib/purchases.ts with: 1) initializePurchases() function that configures Purchases with API key from env (use placeholder EXPO_PUBLIC_REVENUECAT_KEY), 2) getOfferings() to fetch available packages, 3) purchasePackage(pkg) to make a purchase, 4) restorePurchases() for App Store compliance, 5) checkSubscriptionStatus() returning boolean. Create mobile/contexts/SubscriptionContext.tsx that: 1) Wraps the app, provides isSubscribed state, 2) Checks subscription on mount, 3) Exposes purchase/restore functions. Create mobile/app/(protected)/paywall.tsx modal screen showing subscription options with pricing. Update mobile/app/(protected)/settings.tsx to add 'Restore Purchases' button (already partially there) and 'Upgrade to Pro' button. Gate satellite analysis behind subscription (show paywall if not subscribed when tapping Analyze). Call initializePurchases() in the root _layout.tsx.
